subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Adriana's Files/weholdthespiritinnocent.mp3 
  Uploaded by : adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...> 
  Description : Sounds like: We hold the spirit innocent.  This is a file I got on my RS 20-125 over the holidays.  It is similar to the last file I just posted.  At one point I have to have the courage to go out on a limb even if I'm wrong: I think it might be talking about soul judgements. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Adriana%27s%20Files/weholdthespiritinnocent.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.html
Regards,

adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...>
